{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Pronto Networks |model=PN-CPP202 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=10/12/2004 |manuf_country= |manuf=Senao |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=hotspot controller |fcc_id=NI3-IS20V222 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=IDT |cpu1_model=79RC32K438-200BB |cpu1_cspeed=200 |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1=8 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Winbond |ram1_model= |ram1_num=2 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num=2 |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=DE-9 |wi1_module=Senao NL-2511MP PLUS |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model=ISL3874 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3685 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand=Realtek |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= |default_ch= }} ''Pronto Service Controller''
[http://www1.prontonetworks.com/PSC_Tech_Spec_PN_CPP202.pdf Datasheet] :8MB Flash :64MB RAM :IDT RC 32438 MIPS 200MHz architecture based processor :200 mW 802.11b power output The board used in this device is labeled with "NL-5354SR ARIES-2.00" and "701603710300". :It is possible the second Mini PCI slot was omitted on this model.
